issues.title: Auth cleanup: Remove auth_id, fix InMsg deserialization, improve logging

tasks.description: Audit auth_id usage across client and server
Decide: Remove auth_id or alias to token
Update client to use token query param for JWT
Add graceful handling for unexpected InMsg formats
Consider demoting expired token logs to DEBUG level
Update docs if auth parameter names change
